item.title: Windows Run Commands
item.description: Run Commands for Dialogue Box in Windows The Run dialogue box in Microsoft Windows provides a quick and convenient way for you to launch programs, open websites, and access several Windows settings. Let’s take a look at some commands and see how it works. Launching run dialog Launching the Run dialog on Windows is usually done by pressing theâŠž Windows key + R, or else you can simply open the Start Menu and type “run.
